subject: Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: Raj Bhavsar, who almost quit gymnastics after not making the U.S. Olympic team in 2004, is once again risking heartbreak by attempting to make the team.
snippet: Raj Bhavsar, who almost quit gymnastics after not making the U.S. Olympic team in 2004, is once again risking heartbreak by attempting to make the team.
